content.text: I have a lot of responsibilities but I love my life.
I'm the same way! I have a lot of responsibilities but I wouldn't trade them for anything.
My dog is called Alfred. What's your favorite animal?
I grew up with sharks! My favorite animal is the goblin shark.
I love sharks! I don't think I've ever met someone who likes them as much as I do.
I'm so glad I'm not the only one who loves sharks! What's your favorite thing about sharks?
I love their teeth! They're so sharp and they look like they could chew through anything.
I love their teeth too! They're so scary and intimidating.
Have you ever seen a shark in real life?
Yes! I went swimming with sharks in the Bahamas. It was amazing!
I'm so jealous! I've always wanted to swim with sharks.
You should! It's an amazing experience.
I will! I just need to find a place that offers shark swimming.
There are a lot of places that offer shark swimming. You should do some research and find a place that's right for you.
I will! Thanks for the tip!
No problem! I'm always happy to help out a fellow shark lover.
